NAME:
   getenvoy fetch - Download a build of Envoy

USAGE:
   getenvoy fetch [command options] <reference>

DESCRIPTION:
   The '<reference>' minimally includes the Envoy version.
   
   Example: Prefetch Envoy prior to invoking `getenvoy run`
   $ getenvoy fetch 1.17.1
   
   Example: Fetch Envoy to run on a specific platform
   $ getenvoy fetch 1.17.1/linux-glibc
   
   To view all available builds, invoke the "list" command.

OPTIONS:
   --help, -h  show help (default: false)
